divs: Sighting DetailsHi! WOW! Look at these pictures. The moon has an object circling it! This is not the only time i found this anomaly! Looks like a mini moon or large object! It is night. Moon over head. I used my Droid 2 and used reverse light. Normal, blue tint, red tints green tints, etc. No flash, no glare! This is wild! More pictures to come. Only three pictures per report. MUFON may incorporate as they chose to! I have a dozen! G. A from Whittier, Calif.
